 nighlight: Nightlight smiled and said  while she glenty touched elita"It=
's what i needed to know, please stay with her... i would ask Nightshift ca=
re her if he was here" "What's happening mom?"said Elite with yawn "all wil=
l be all right, my dear"said Nighlight"sleep" Elita felt sleep once more, N=
ightlight kissed her and she stood up and slowly left the room To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...

-0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        












St=
raight Shot carries a worried expression on her face as she looks down to E=
lita, gently stroking her fur with a tender hand.
" She's in very good hand=
s Nightlight.  Of course I'll be sure she has someone ta take good care of =
her.  And you should see how Tucson interacts with her.  Once he holds her,=
 he's not about ta put her down too fast.  And despite his temper, he's a r=
eal softy when it comes ta being around youngsters Elita's age.  I know wha=
t he's gonna do if he and Talon have ta adopt Elita, he's gonna spoil her r=
otten.  All dads wanna spoil their kids, especially if they consider them "=
 Daddy's little girl."
"Look at me, I wanna do the same thing, I just wanna=
 hold her and never let go.   And if anyone is gonna make phenomenal parent=
s it's Talon and Tucson.  I know how much it would mean ta both of them ta =
have a young bot look up to them and depend on them for guidance and protec=
tion, because that's what parents do and I know a great pair of parents whe=
n I see them."
She smiles to Talon as she makes her last statement.

Perpet=
ually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at 8:16 PM, Airsha=
dow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
=
      


nightlight:
 
"I have things to do"said the femme"and I need to be=
 sure that Elita will be ok, he wants us then I plan to find him before he =
comes... dont ask me more; less you know, and elita will be safer "
 
To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 09=
:46:56 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        







=





Straight Shot falls off her seat with her mouth wide open.
" Yeah, wha=
t Talon said, what're ya saying?  Nightlight, things will be okay I'm sure =
they will."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

 at 12:21 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

 Talom/Nightlight:
 
Nighlight looked at Tal=
on and Straightshot and Talon said "That's true... We belive that is that o=
r something is controlling him... "
 
Nightlight said almost in low voice "=
If something happens me, will you and Tucson care Elita?"
 
Talon looked su=
rpriced at Nightlight and said "What are you saying?"

ject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        












Straight Sh=
ot enters the room with Talon and is careful not to wake Elita.  She smiles=
 while looking to Nightlight and the cub.
" I can just see it now, all of u=
s together, watching the young bots develop Their skills together..  Elita =
would really love ta have someone ta pal around with.  I bet in the near fu=
ture that will happen.  And Nightlight, don't worry, Ticson is out there lo=
oking for Wheelie and I bet he'll find Rodimus too.  I got ta thinking abou=
t things and I realized that the shell program was long since gone a while =
ago.   I bet that Dark Rodimus is a copy of the real Rodimus.  And if they'=
re out there, Tucson will find them.  Isn't that right, Talon?"

Perpetuall=
y on the move and constantly busy.

light whose was looking at the floor.

ons to be Learned.










        












Straight Shot transforms =
into her robot mode and follows Talon to Nightlight's quarters.  She was ha=
ppy to know that her suggestion was actually considered by Leo Prime, about=
 getting the femme bots together as a team.
" I really didn't think Leo wou=
ld go for my idea of letting the femme bots work as a team.  He sure surpri=
sed me."

o be Learned.










        












Nightshift thinks for a moment=
. If anything, Tucson would rely on ground tracking to find Wheelie.  
" Mo=
st likely his field track'n tactics.  That means he's gonna land at the are=
a and attempt ta follow Wheelie on foot.  He knows how ta identify a bot ju=
st by foot and tire tracks alone. One more thing, he's got sharp senses and=
 he was promised he'd be able ta go it alone.  Get downwind of him and he w=
on't be too happy.  Even I know better then ta mess with him."


Perpetuall=
y on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 6:28 PM, Super Cycl=
onus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      >=
 <OLD>

>

> Nightshift nods to Leo's request.

>

> " School will have ta =
open a little later than expected.  Okay Leo, I'm on

> it."

>

> He trans=
forms into SUV mode and rolls off toward Polar Claw.

>

> " Hey Leo, ya mi=
ght wanna make sure Tucson doesn't see ya!  He gets wind

> that you didn't=
 let em do that mission on his own, he's gonna see that as an

> act of dis=
trust.  Then he's really gonna be in a bad mood.  Trust me, I

> know.  Rat=
chet was the same way.  Like dad like son."



<NEW>



"I know." LEO PRIME=
 said over the radio "But sometimes things are far

more important than his=
 anger."



When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's location he was already=


standing with RAMULUS and the group's tactical expert PROWL, they were

a=
ll in robot mode standing at the shuttle.



WOLFGANG was standing off to t=
he side manipulating something. "Its

fueled up and ready to go." WLFGANG s=
aid as he stowed an energon

dispensing unit in its holster.



"Good!" POL=
AR CLAW said. he was easily the largest of the group. While

not as tall as=
 RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still broad and massive,

giving he appeara=
nce of great size and ferocity.



POLAR CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT,=
 "You're here because you know

Tuscon better than we." There was a dismiss=
ive grunt as he glanced at

a PADD he had in his hand, it is ohviously the =
notes and mission

parameters he recieved from LEO PRIME.



"He's gone out=
 alone. Sensors showed that he was going off in the

direction of that jung=
le where Rodimus is suppose to be." There was

another pause from POLAR CLA=
W, "The same direction Wheelie took as

well."



POLAR CLAW lowered his pa=
dd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we

have of that place shows it =
is a dense jungle, his inhanced senses

will not help him much there. What =
tactic do you think he will use to

locate Wheelie?"



(TAG)

ely on ground tracking to find Wheelie.  </div><div><br></div><div>" M=
ost likely his field track'n tactics.  That means he's gonna land at t=
he area and attempt ta follow Wheelie on foot.  He knows how ta identi=
fy a bot just by foot and tire tracks alone. One more thing, he's got sharp=
 senses and he was promised he'd be able ta go it alone.  Get downwind=

><br>
> Nights=
hift nods to Leo's request.<br>
><br>
> " School will have ta open a =
little later than expected.  Okay Leo, I'm on<br>
> it."<br>
><br>
&g=
t; He transforms into SUV mode and rolls off toward Polar Claw.<br>
><br=
>
> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure Tucson doesn't see ya!  He gets =
wind<br>
> that you didn't let em do that mission on his own, he's gonna=
 see that as an<br>
> act of distrust.  Then he's really gonna be in a b=
ad mood.  Trust me, I<br>
> know.  Ratchet was the same way.  Like dad l=
ike son."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
"I know." LEO PRIME said over the r=
adio "But sometimes things are far<br>
more important than his anger."<br>
=
<br>
When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's location he was already<br>
st=
anding with RAMULUS and the group's tactical expert PROWL, they were<br>
al=
l in robot mode standing at the shuttle.<br>
<br>
WOLFGANG was standing off=
 to the side manipulating something. "Its<br>
fueled up and ready to go." W=
LFGANG said as he stowed an energon<br>
dispensing unit in its holster.<br>=

<br>
"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the largest of the group. Whil=
e<br>
not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still broad and massive=
,<br>
giving he appearance of great size and ferocity.<br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW =
turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know<br>
Tuscon bett=
er than we." There was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at<br>
a PADD he ha=
d in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mission<br>
parameters he reci=
eved from LEO PRIME.<br>
<br>
"He's gone out alone. Sensors showed that he =
was going off in the<br>
direction of that jungle where Rodimus is suppose =
to be." There was<br>
another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same direction Wh=
eelie took as<br>
well."<br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as he looked =
at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we<br>
have of that place shows it is a dense ju=
ngle, his inhanced senses<br>
will not help him much there. What tactic do =
you think he will use to<br>
locate Wheelie?"<br>
